function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of fast and deliberate response to the crisis","Impact":"Increased spread and severity of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Developing rapid response protocols, ensuring effective communication, and implementing technology for remote service delivery","Technologies":"Remote communication tools, digital service platforms","People":"Customers, employees, and the general public","Owner":"Service providers, regulatory agencies, and government"},{"Description":"Lack of cognitive trust through untact channels and strong relationships in banking services","Impact":"Loss of confidence in banking services, leading to economic instability","Mitigation":"Developing untact communication strategies, enhancing customer relationship management, and promoting transparency in financial operations","Technologies":"Data encryption, secure communication channels, CRM software","People":"Bank customers, financial institutions, and the general public","Owner":"Banking institutions, regulatory agencies"},{"Description":"Inability to act quickly on learnings and develop innovative service products for food service businesses","Impact":"Inability to adapt to changing consumer behavior and market demands, resulting in decreased revenue and business sustainability","Mitigation":"Implementing agile product development processes, conducting market research, and leveraging digital marketing strategies","Technologies":"Agile development tools, market research software, digital marketing platforms","People":"Food service customers, employees, and the general public","Owner":"Food service businesses, marketing and product development teams"}]}
